issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement split function in gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9620](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9620). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a function to split a line of text using a particular delimiter, and return a particular substring

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9620?focusedCommentId=17565484) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
